meaningMnemonic: A <radical>leader</radical> who's <radical>humble</radical> will <kanji>stretch</kanji> in front of everyone. They'll show that they have to get up every hour or so and stretch just like the rest of us.
readingMnemonic: The leader is currently working hard to <kanji>stretch</kanji> in front of all of you, and as he does, he munches on some <reading>no</reading>ri (の) seaweed snacks. Then he starts stretching the nori too.
